about_the_game:
Play the all new Space For Sale Demo! Embark on your first mission.

Use your wits and tools to survive and take your first steps to rise to the top of the space property biz!
detailed_description:
Play the all new Space For Sale Demo! Embark on your first mission.

Use your wits and tools to survive and take your first steps to rise to the top of the space property biz!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play the all new Space For Sale Demo! Embark on your first mission. Use your wits and tools to survive and take your first steps to rise to the top of the space property biz!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
